title: Understanding the decomposition process of the Pt1Ag24(SPhCl2)18 nanocluster at the atomic level
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10574-10579
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01274G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kefan Jiang, Along Ma, Yuansheng Li, Jiawei Wang, Zhengmao Yin, Shuxin Wang
By investigating the decomposition of Pt1Ag24(SR)18, we synthesized two Pt1Ag24(SR)20 nanoclusters (NC-I and NC-II) and a Pt1Ag4 complex. Analysis showed that Pt1Ag4's ligands directly stem from type I and II ligands in NC-I.
